h1_title: Secret Bosses in Black Myth Wukong
content: Black Myth: Wukong has a wealth of secrets to discover, from Transformation Spells to hidden Key Items and, of course, bosses. While some secret bosses can be found through exploration, others are well-hidden and require completing NPC questlines, collecting multiple items, or even fighting mini-bosses to make them emerge. Here's a breakdown of all the secret bosses in the game, organised by chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Black Myth Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Black Myth: Wukong has a wealth of secrets to discover, from Transformation Spells to hidden Key Items and, of course, bosses. While some secret bosses can be found through exploration, others are well-hidden and require completing NPC questlines, collecting multiple items, or even fighting mini-bosses to make them emerge. Here's a breakdown of all the secret bosses in the game, organised by chapter.
